sentence.Network_en: It was not right to seclude themselves like that.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不应当那样与世隔绝.

sentence.Network_en: She would seclude herself from the world forever.
sentence.Network_cn: 她要永远摆脱这个世界.

sentence.Network_en: Seclude the reading nook from other parts of the room if possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果有可能的话,最好把读书角和房间其他空间分开.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... seaweed 海澡 seclude 隔离 second 第二;赞成.
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... camp（ 野营，阵营）； seclude（ 隔绝，分离）； city（ 城市）；.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... reclusive a 隐居的 seclude v 孤立；隐居 seclusive a 爱隐居的.
GRE单词讲义(陈琦) - 豆丁网 ... interlude 中场休息 seclude 隐退 occlude 闭塞.

list.abs: the rich secluded themselves from contact with the poor ., 富人不肯同穷人接触.
重叶莲 callianthemus重楼 secluded chamber重楼 petiolate paris [root]
金榜起名网 - 林奕晴 ... (6)同本义[ forest;grove;woods] (9)指野外或退隐的地方[ secluded place] (1)光明[ bright].
That is a secluded place ., 那是个僻静的地方.
This is the quiet and most secluded area of the city ., 这是全城最安静最僻静的地区.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'obstruct access to'): from Latin secludere, from se- 'apart' + claudere 'to shut'

sentences.sentence: "He sequestered himself in his study to write a book"

auth_sentence.content: Shrubs inside the paling seclude the place from the street.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shrubs inside the paling seclude the place from the street.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shrubs inside the paling seclude the place from the street.

stems_affixes.word_buile: conclude[[v.结论;终结]]男→adj.决定性的;结论性的
exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→adj.排外的, 孤高的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
occlude[[v.闭塞,堵塞]]男稳荽省鷑.闭塞,堵塞
preclude[[v.妨碍;阻止]]→n.排除, 阻止
con全部+clud关闭+e→全部关掉→结束
ex出+clud关闭+e→关出去→排除
in进入+clude=clud关闭→关进去→包括
oc一再+clude=clud关闭→一再关起来不畅通→堵塞
pre预先,提前+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
se分开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的
se分开,离开,区别开+clus关闭+ive……的→喜欢把自己关起来→隐居的
sed=se分开,离开,区别开+it走+ion表名词→分开走→煽动叛乱
se分开,离开,区别开+ced走+e→走开→退出
se分开,离开,区别开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的
se分开,离开,区别开+cret区别+e→分辨开→分泌;藏起来
se分开,离开,区别开+duce引→引开→勾引别人
se分开,离开,区别开+greg群+ate表动词→和人群分开→隔离
se分开,离开,区别开+lect选→选出分开
se分开,离开,区别开+ver分开→分离开→切断
